name: 3D platformer (tutorial submission) (blimpgorbus)
description:
Proposed ideas

A level in which you can't hop on heads to defeat anything, only bait them into traps ( the level would either be really small, or bouncing off of heads does nothing, enemies will also be colored differently) 

implement some sort of air  dash

I found some gun prefabs as well as a script for them, i will implement that somewhere 

put secrets around the map purely for random jokes or entertainment
